Key Match Events: Trent Boult became the first player to bowl four maidens in a Twenty20 World Cup match
Trent Boult finished with 3-0, taking all of PNG's wickets
Daryl Mitchell completed the win with 19 off 12 balls
Post-Match Reflections: Trent Boult expressed mixed emotions and reflected on his time with Tim Southee
Gary Stead's side finished the tournament with back-to-back wins
Miscellaneous Highlights: There was a rain delay of more than an hour before the match started
New Zealand struggled in the tournament, particularly in the group stages
